creator: Pegasus Airlines
descriptionHtml:
I offer special flight deals exclusively on the app. If you’re interested in finding cheap flight tickets, download my app and I’ll let you know when opportunities arise!

Yes, I am an app that makes you buy lots of cheap flight tickets and send you on lots of spontaneous journeys, I admit!

So… How do I do that?
• I offer mobile only campaigns and you enjoy best prices.
• I double your BolPoints from your purchases, and you pay with your BolPoints.
• I pay extra BolPoints for your hotel reservations from Pegasus App, and you organize your trip favorable deals.

I hear you say: ""But, dear Pegasus... You only tell good sides of you. Do not you have any bad sides?"" Sure, there are! But I work hard, day and night, with an enormous team to enhance the experiences of my users. I go through all the comments, one by one, so that you can get better flight deals.

What you can do with my app:

• Get cheap flight tickets
• Plan your trip ahead
• Choose your seat
• Order your meal beforehand
• Buy additional luggage
• Book your hotel room
• Rent a car
• Buy Fast Track
• Gift flight tickets with Gift Card
• Become a member of BolBol, my loyalty program
• Collect BolPoints, my flight points

No doubt that these are not the only things you can do with the app of “The Digital Airlines of Turkey.” You can find out more when you download my app.... Hearing about me is not enough, you have to experience me, dear!

FAQ

Let's go through the questions you are dying to know about me, flights bookings, cheap flights, flight deals, and much more…

How can I auto-fill my passenger information?

You'll need a BolBol account first. If you're not a member yet, you can easily sign up. You have to be signed in to your BolBol account to auto-fill your information.

If you want to buy a flight ticket for another person, you need to go to User Settings and create a new profile for that person through ""My Contacts"" tab. Fill out the information for once and then save. This way you can buy flight tickets faster next time!

How can I save my credit card information?

Go to your User Settings and find Saved Cards tab. Here you can safely manage, save, change or delete any of your cards. By saving credit card information, you won't need to fill out your card information and choose one of your saved cards faster when you are buying your next ticket. All of your information is protected in our secure database.

Also, you can save your card information at the Checkout screen and use the saved information to buy your next cheap flight ticket.

After the last update, the app doesn't open or respond. What should I do?

Unfortunately, I have to update my app to make it better and fix known issues. My app will be guiding you through the update processes so that you can use the most recent version.

BONUS

How can I get the cheapest flight tickets?

First, you can download my app to help me alert you for flight deals of Pegasus Airlines.

At flight finder screen you can filter tickets by price, so you can choose the most suitable flight for yourself.

Also, you can plan your trip in advance and find the cheapest flight tickets on my app.

***

That's all for now! Don't forget to rate me ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ ⭐ 😘
descriptionShort: DOWNLOAD THE APP, FIND THE BEST FLIGHT DEALS, FLY TO NEW ADVENTURES!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Here is the 'Travel Assistant'
Now, under the menu section 'My Flights' you can access all details regarding your flight on one screen with the Travel Assistant and edit them easily.
Some of what you can do with the Travel Assistant on one screen:
• Ticket processes
• Add seats, meals, luggage etc. to the flight
• Check-in
• Show boarding pass
• Follow the notifications regarding your flight
Update your app now and be the first to try the new features!

How can I auto-fill my passenger information?

title: Book Flight Tickets by Pegasus

creator: Pegasus Airlines
descriptionHtml:
Discover the Most Affordable Flight Ticket Prices with Pegasus App
Are you ready for your next trip? Are you looking for a flight ticket? It’s time to use the easy travel app by Pegasus for cheap air tickets to your selected destination. Click on the “search flights” button and follow these steps:

Click the single or return ticket options,
Find the nearest airport to your choice of city,
Browse the year, month and day on the calendar,
Tick your time preferences on the specified date,
Wait for flight prices to appear on the screen.
Renewed User-Friendly Design
Every click saves your time. This easy-use plane tickets app helps you monitor the best deals on search cheap flights panel. Airlines tickets booking is reserved on the app memory. Log in to see your reserved flight with the date, time and flight prices. What is more on Pegasus flight ticket app?

Check low-cost travel by the compare flights and ticket fares options.
Screen your Boarding Pass on the app.
Click on Extras icon to check and pay ticket charges for exceeding amounts of luggage.
Use the My Trips icon to get access to your reservation flight and previous travel tickets.
Easy Reservation

Flight ticket booking app designed for Pegasus passengers keep an easy travel motto. Book a flight and pay for your airline tickets after several browses and clicks. Reserve flights from one of Eco, Super Eco, Advantage and Business Flex travel packages on the app.
Super Eco: Only hand luggage is available for international flights with no on-board meal option.
Eco: No meal is available but apart from hand luggage, 15 kg. baggage is acceptable for domestic flights and 20 kg. baggage is accepted for international flights.
Advantage: Seat booking and Pegasus Cafe meal/beverage options are available. Fly&Watch is also active onboard.
Business Flex: Apart from baggage options, you can change and cancel your ticket, book your seat and use Fly&Watch channel.
Fast and Secure Payment Process
Complete your flight reservation with easy payment steps. Pegasus App keeps your personal and financial details private during payment steps. Encrypted data on the app enables secure payment with a fast connection to your selected bank. You can prefer credit cards or payment orders from several options to buy your airline ticket. Pegasus app helps you freeze the ticket price if you don’t finish the payment immediately. You can pay in any currency of your choice.
BolBol Privileges
Pegasus stands out with its Gift Card and BolBol credits. BolBol members get the benefits of this frequent flier program.
Earn extra BolPoints by shopping at Pegasus BolBol shop.
No need to remember your PNR number, BolBol membership does it for you!
Double your BolPoints by spending on the Pegasus app.
Book international flights or a ticket to domestic airports using your BolPoints.
Pegasus cheap airline tickets are available not only for BolBol members but also for their spouses, children and associates.
Additional Services

Download Pegasus App to get the comfort of fully planning your flight, accommodation, transport, and insurance needs. You can directly access Additional Services by clicking the ¨More Services¨ icon. What kind of services are available on the Pegasus flight ticket booking app?
Book your hotel, B&B accommodation and airport transfer via Pegasus offers.
Rent a car at your final destination using packages by Pegasus partners.
Buy travel insurance connected to your flight ticket.
Show your affection by sending your loved ones a Gift Card to enable their free trips.

Advantages of Using the Pegasus App
Flight search on the app monitors cheap flight tickets for the specified dates just with a click.
Join the BolBol members family to collect BolPoints for discount tickets.
Activate the Notifications of special offers to plan your next travel search.
Use Travel Assistant under the ¨My Trips¨ menu to manage your seat reservation, add meals, pay for extra baggage and see urgent notifications.
descriptionShort: Looking for a flights ticket? Download app for the cheapest price and campaign!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
"Dear Guests,

We've got a great new features for you in this update.

We have renewed the homepage of our mobile app to give you a better experience! With our brand new screen that welcomes you, you can search for flights and reach the last searched ports!

By the way, a little reminder! By updating the application immediately, you'll be informed about promotions 1 day in advance. Update the application now, be the first to experience what's new!"
